Articles.Content:
This is my first successful spaceplane launched creation. Thanks to the people in general forum who sorted out my issues with why it was flipping at the start of flight.

You can see it just after impact on the mun where, thanks to some funny physics, the capsule survived a 70m/s impact and bounced to a safe touchdown at 7m/s.

Nice! I really wouldn\'t expect something that small to make it all that way. I suppose with that little weight it can manage it. Slowing down must be hair-raising though.

Good job!
